name: Hopped-Up Bloody Mary
garnish: 1 Shrimp, lemon zest, fennel and pink peppercorns
preparation:
Coat the rim of a highball glass with sea salt.
Add the remaining ingredients and stir to combine.
Fill with ice and stir again, briefly.
Garnish with a cocktail shrimp, a fennel stalk, lemon zest and freshly ground pink peppercorns.
